Title: Relates to seaweed cultivation in underwater lands at Gardiner's and Peconic bays
Summary: Permits seaweed cultivation in underwater lands at Gardiner's and Peconic bays; relates to leases for seaweed cultivation.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-0302, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to permitting seaweed cultivation in underwater lands at Gardiner's and Peconic bays
